body_html: This is a very unsatisfying answer for those of us who are trying to persuade TensorFlow to run on new hardware. It is not an internal op if it appears in the protocol buffer. Please rethink this...
body_text: This is a very unsatisfying answer for those of us who are trying to persuade TensorFlow to run on new hardware.  It is not an internal op if it appears in the protocol buffer.  Please rethink this...
body: This is a very unsatisfying answer for those of us who are trying to persuade TensorFlow to run on new hardware.  It is not an internal op if it appears in the protocol buffer.  Please rethink this...
